messages.subject: A Dad's answer to the typical unschooling questions
messages.msgSnippet: OK, I m trying my best to keep up with all of you, but am finding that I just don t have as much time at this machine as it takes, sometimes!  Good for you for
messages.messageBody:
OK, I'm trying my best to keep up with all of you, but am finding
that I just don't have as much time at this machine as it takes,
sometimes! Good for you for being able to manage your time better
than I...or thanks for sharing your time with us now that your kids
are older and off doing their own thing!

My hubby started blogging after LIFE is Good. I was very please at
this, since there are few Dad's perspectives out there. Jeff is in
Human Resources, so sees more people in a month than I do in a year.
I think he gets asked about unschooling more than I do - and frankly
is more open to talking with people that have no idea what it's all
about. Anyway, he wrote in his blog about some of the questions that
he comes across. Here is the link to his response:
http://freeboysdad.blogspot.com/search/label/Common%20Unschooling%
20Questions

Hope you find this insightful.

Ginger
